formintro:
Review the customers applications and existing details in their account.

Consult the guidance in the procedure https://solidi.freshdesk.com/a/solutions/articles/35000164640.

questions.label: Review of info provided in form
questions.guidance: Does the information supplied by the customer match with our existing information? Has any significant time elapsed since originally supplied that could account for differences? (E.g. slight salary increase). If so then update the information.

questions.label: Reason for Limits
questions.guidance: What was the reason for the customer requesting higher limits.

questions.label: SOF / SOW
questions.guidance: Are the proposed limits supported by SOF/SOW evidence? Can we justify the limits?

questions.label: PEP status
questions.guidance: Is the customer or relation a PEP - what actions are we taking to mitigate this?

questions.label: Adverse Media
questions.guidance: Provide details of adverse media searches performed.

questions.label: Open Source
questions.guidance: Provide details of open source searches/checks performed.

questions.label: Additional Supporting Documents
questions.guidance: Please provide any additional documents found in opensource / adverse media searches

questions.label: Approved
questions.guidance: Are we approving this limit increase?
